title: Car sales decline for third straight month in September
description: Car sales have dropped for three months in a row, despite discounts. Major players like Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, and Tata Motors reported reduced sales. However, Mahindra & Mahindra and Toyota saw a rise. Automakers are hopeful that the upcoming festive season will boost demand. Two-wheeler and tractor sales have shown growth.
